Alumnis.name: Joshua Nyambane
Alumnis.review: Attending BaySide International High School transformed my academic journey. The diverse curriculum and supportive teachers set a strong foundation for my career in tech.

Alumnis.name: Ivy Bella
Alumnis.review: BaySide International High School nurtured my creativity and passion for design. The art programs and inspiring faculty helped me hone my skills and find my path.

Alumnis.name: Kevin Kiptoo
Alumnis.review: The rigorous academic environment at BaySide prepared me for the challenges of university and beyond. The focus on critical thinking was invaluable.

Alumnis.name: Diana Shauri
Alumnis.review: BaySide fostered my interest in marketing and communication. The extracurricular activities and leadership opportunities were instrumental in shaping my career.

Alumnis.name: Namada Jr
Alumnis.review: The strong emphasis on STEM subjects at BaySide equipped me with the technical skills I needed. The hands-on projects were particularly beneficial!

Alumnis.name: Bob Oyier
Alumnis.review: BaySide's science programs ignited my passion for research. The lab facilities and mentorship from teachers were outstanding and helped me excel.

Alumnis.name: Titus Ouko
Alumnis.review: The economics and finance classes at BaySide were incredibly helpful. They provided me with a solid grounding in financial principles that I still use today.

Alumnis.name: Fatma Omar
Alumnis.review: BaySide's journalism program honed my writing and storytelling skills. The opportunities to report on real events were invaluable for my growth as a journalist.
